Series.Actors: |Andrew Lincoln|Norman Reedus|Steven Yeun|Emma Bell|Jon Bernthal|Sarah Wayne Callies|Melissa McBride|David Morrissey|Michael Rooker|Emily Kinney|Scott Wilson|Irone Singleton|Lauren Cohan|Danai Gurira|Chandler Riggs|Laurie Holden|Jeffrey DeMunn|
Series.Overview: Based on the comic book series of the same name, The Walking Dead tells the story of a small group of survivors living in the aftermath of a zombie apocalypse.
